property.name: mediadisplayblurb
property.value: Presenting a slideshow with a sign language interpreter, U.S.

note.text: Interpreted conversations tend to take twice as long as regular ones. If you and your interpreter have never worked together before, you should practice to determine the desired pace of conversation.
In addition, you and your interpreter should discuss how to communicate misunderstandings, topic changes, and information about things like body language without disrupting the conversation.
